definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain

sentences.english: Zip and button fastening. Curved waistband with belt loops.
sentences.chinese: 拉链和纽扣固定，腰带带有带环。

sentences.english: The ball is sealed with a zipper and floats in a pool or a lake.
sentences.chinese: 这个球用一个拉链封口，漂浮在池子或湖里。

sentences.english: The swift fold works well with your zip-up hoodie.
sentences.chinese: 折叠工程的迅速和你的拉链帽衫。

sentences.english: Snap, hook & loop and zipper waist with adjusters.
sentences.chinese: 管理单元，钩和调节器的循环与拉链腰部。

sentences.english: IDEAL supplies zippers to the leading apparel brands and retailers in the USA and Europe.
sentences.chinese: 理想拉链集团是众多欧美顶级衣履品牌之拉链供货商。

sentences.english: IDEAL supplies zippers to the leading apparel brands and retailers in the USA and Europe.
sentences.chinese: 理想拉链集团是众多欧美顶级衣履品牌之拉链供货商。

sentences.english: The Mares Cruise Journey Backpack has rugged construction with spiral zips and metal pull.
sentences.chinese: 母马邮轮之旅背包已与螺旋拉链和金属拉坚固的结构。

sentences.english: No puckering or stretching of fabric when zipper is inserted.
sentences.chinese: 当拉链装上后布料外观不能起皱或拉长。

sentences.english: The only thing I’ve ever done behind your back is zipping you up.
sentences.chinese: 我在你背后做的唯一一件事就是帮你拉拉链。

sentences.english: Featuring an easy to use ring pull zip.
sentences.chinese: 它采用了易于使用的拉链拉环。

sentences.english: Featuring elasticated cuffs and an easy to use ring pull zip.
sentences.chinese: 设有松紧袖口和一个易于使用的拉链拉环。

sentences.english: Help me, the bag won't zip up.
sentences.chinese: 帮我一下，这个包拉链关不上。

sentences.english: We want to buy Accessories, Buttons, Zippers , Cloth, Clothes, Chocolates.
sentences.chinese: 我们要采购配件，钮扣，拉链，布匹，衣服，巧克力。

sentences.english: Zip-up hip pockets are perfect on the slopes or in the city.
sentences.chinese: 拉链臀部口袋完美的山坡上或在城市。

definition: a buckle or fastener for clothing that does not use a button and buttonhole (e.g. the buckle on metal wristwatches)
hidden snap fastener (concealed behind a flap on a garment)
collar/neckband/neckline/the place where the two ends of a collar meet
